participant_1.background:
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i would be honored to give my life for my country.
I'm a single night owl who enjoys my work.
I love gummy bears and never had kids.
I exercise every day for an hour because it helps me stay fit and healthy.

participant_2.background:
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
i hate tomatoes.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Great, thanks for asking! I'm just recovering from knee surgery, but my dog Snowball is keeping me company.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you have a good companion to help you through your recovery.
Thanks! I'm really looking forward to being able to use my power tools again. I love working on projects around the house.
I'm sure you'll be back to it in no time! What kind of projects do you like to work on?
I love to build furniture and fix up old cars. I'm always looking for new projects to take on.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very handy, but I always admire people who can do things like that.
It's never too late to learn! There are a lot of great resources available online and at your local library.
That's a good idea! I might just have to look into that.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
